name: sandstorm
description: Sandstorm is a self-hosted platform to run web apps securely in isolated sandboxes. It includes app packaging, updates, and permissions control, ideal for personal cloud services.

features.title: App Sandboxing
features.description: Runs each application in isolated containers for enhanced security

features.title: One
features.description: Deploy web apps from the app market with a single click

features.title: Automatic Updates
features.description: Keeps installed apps up-to-date with automatic version management

features.title: Granular Permissions
features.description: Control app access to data and resources with fine-grained permissions

features.title: Sharing Controls
features.description: Share app instances with specific users or groups with customizable access levels

features.title: Single Sign
features.description: Unified authentication across all installed apps with OAuth and LDAP support

features.title: App Packaging
features.description: Package any web app using the Sandstorm packaging format for distribution

features.title: Resource Isolation
features.description: Prevents apps from interfering with each other through strict resource limits
